<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Opportunistic Grapple](/Feats.aspx?ID=6285) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 191 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Bounty Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=243)

**Prerequisites**
[Bounty Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6281)

**Trigger**
Your [prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=2257) critically fails on an attack roll against you with a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306).

**Requirements**
Your prey is within your reach, you have one free hand, and your target is no more than one size larger than you.

</column>

---

You use an opening to capture your prey. You attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) your prey.
